page.title: 19TYPICAL FAMILY WEEKEND
page.content: Saturday mornings we usually get up about 9:30am,have our Breakfast,wash clean our teeth,get dressed & then watch T.V.or go to Yarmouth,or just play with our pets,ride our bike,or rollerskate,or play skipping. During the morning we have a drink & snacks. Most Saturdays Nan & Grandad come to see us & so does our sister.if we don't go out I have to do my homework, if not it has to be done in the evening,but most Saturday evenings we all go out. Sunday is usually a lazy day,when we do what we feel like doing.Mum & Dad are up early,we get up quite late,but still have breakfast, then we see to our pets & play.Every 3rd Sunday we go to church at 3:00pm. At 5:00pm we have tea then we relax. In the evenings we have a cup of tea & fresh cream cake which mum makes,we go to bed at 8:30pm.
